title: Bug Splat during loading screen
body:
Hello everyone!

I'm having a bug splat error popup when I get into the loading screen. I am unable to reconnect at all since the bug splat just reappears. 
The only way I was able to resolve this issue was to reconnect my laptop to my computer monitor (the issue when I decided to play on my regular laptop screen-- a rare occasion).

I am going away for a few weeks, so I will be unable to bring my monitor with me. 
Does anyone know why there seems to be an issue with my client  when I am not connected to my monitor?

Anything will help!

Thanks!

replies.body: I dont think it is any bad game files? I dont think it would be a driver issue either. The bugsplat only appears when I do not connect my laptop to my second monitor.

This bugspalt issue can be caused by bad game files, driver issues, or even hardware.  My suggestion would be to go over each step of the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) to fix this up.  You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) if using the legacy client to help!  Let me know if you have any questions!
